message: Allen hit 3 pointer #2,561 against the Lakers to surpass Reggie Millers record a full 300 games faster. http://sports.espn.go.com/boston/nba/news/story?id=6110819
Oh man, Allen with the most perfect shot ... EVAR.  So fluid, so silky .... so ... perfect.  Insane how far these two are ahead of even 3rd place ... and it's been said, but Kidd?  Whaaa?  Crazy!
